item.description:
It's time to go back to Miya's! We were treated like royalty last time we were there. We will be doing a prix fixe at $25 per person. They have a $35 and a $45 version, but I wanted to keep it affordable. It includes an appetizer, salad, 7 - 9 rolls (mostly vegetarian), and a dessert or ice cream. Such a deal! They were working on the new prix fixe menu when I called.

Also please note that we are meeting on a SATURDAY this month, so that folks who have trouble coming out on a Sunday may be able to join us this time.

*** We collect a small fee of $1.00 per guest to offset the monthly charge for running the meetup. It is very much appreciated! ***

 

 

 

 

http://miyassushi.com/

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday at Miya's
